long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OnlyImages removes all texts from the screen, only leaving images!

It's great when you wish to focus merely on images and not the distracting texts.

Simply click on the OnlyImages icon on the top-right side to turn off/on the extension.
